description: This file defines an ApiService class that encapsulates HTTP request handling using Axios, including setup for interceptors, methods for RESTful operations (GET, POST, PUT, PATCH, DELETE), file upload, and token management for authentication. It serves as a central API client for the React application.

classes.name: ApiService
classes.description: A class providing HTTP methods with integrated interceptors and token management for API communication.

methods.name: constructor
methods.description: Initializes the ApiService, setting up base URL, Axios client, and interceptors.

methods.name: setupInterceptors
methods.description: Sets up request and response interceptors for handling authorization headers and error responses.

methods.name: handleError
methods.description: Processes errors from Axios responses and returns an ApiError object.

methods.name: get
methods.description: Performs a GET request to the specified URL with optional config.

methods.name: post
methods.description: Performs a POST request to the specified URL with data and optional config.

methods.name: put
methods.description: Performs a PUT request to the specified URL with data and optional config.

methods.name: patch
methods.description: Performs a PATCH request to the specified URL with data and optional config.

methods.name: delete
methods.description: Performs a DELETE request to the specified URL with optional config.

methods.name: upload
methods.description: Uploads a file to the specified URL with optional progress callback.

methods.name: setAuthToken
methods.description: Stores an authentication token in local storage.

methods.name: removeAuthToken
methods.description: Removes authentication and refresh tokens from local storage.

methods.name: getAuthToken
methods.description: Retrieves the stored authentication token from local storage.
